titleStmt.title: Some select psalms of David turn'd a-new into metre, and suited to the common tunes sung in parish churches: with a divine Pindarique ode on the redemption of man. / By Charles Wormington, Gent.
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. 1697.
titleStmt.author: Wormington, Charles, fl. 1697.

notesStmt.note: "A divine Pindarique ode" has special t.p. and separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in: Trinty College (Dublin, Ireland) Library.
